price: 4. Kuris maitino juos, (išgelbėdamas) nuo alkio, ir apsaugojo juos, (išgelbėdamas) nuo baimės.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
